entities.description: Frequency count of responses for the survey variable before weighting.
Percentage of the responses of the total unweighted frequency.
The amount of missing data for the survey variable expressed in frequency count and percentage.
The total number of responses for the survey variable, combining the unweighted frequency.

relationships.description: Relates a survey variable to its unweighted frequency counts.
Indicates the percentage representation of the survey variable's response frequency.
Indicates the presence of missing data for the survey variable.
Represents the total survey responses for a variable.
